00093   return true;

00102  public function printResults($nl = "\n") {
00103   $this->printField("blankLines      ", $this->blankLines, $nl);
00104   $this->printField("characters      ", $this->characters, $nl);
00105   $this->printField("classes         ", $this->classes, $nl);

00107   $this->printField("files           ", $this->files, $nl);
00108   $this->printField("functions       ", $this->functions, $nl);
00109   $this->printField("interfaceMethods", $this->interfaceMethods, $nl);
00110   $this->printField("interfaces      ", $this->interfaces, $nl);
00111   $this->printField("logicalLines    ", $this->logicalLines, $nl);
00112   $this->printField("methods         ", $this->methods, $nl);
00113   $this->printField("physicalLines   ", $this->physicalLines, $nl);
00114   $this->printField("staticMethods   ", $this->staticMethods, $nl);
